arca.ste.key_derivation package

Submodules

arca.ste.key_derivation.key_derivation_scheme module

class KeyDerivationScheme

Bases: abc.ABC

An interface representing a key derivation scheme.

abstract hkdf(base_key: bytes, purpose: str) → bytes

Derives a key from base_key for the given human-readable purpose.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to derive from

  • purpose¶ – the purpose of the new key

Returns

a byte string representing the derived key

arca.ste.key_derivation.simple_key_derivation_scheme module

class SimpleKeyDerivationScheme

Bases: arca.ste.key_derivation.key_derivation_scheme.KeyDerivationScheme

A simple key derivation scheme using primitives from the simple crypto module. Implements the HashFunctionScheme interface.

hkdf(base_key: bytes, purpose: str) → bytes

Derives a key from base_key for the given human-readable purpose.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to derive from

  • purpose¶ – the purpose of the new key

Returns

a byte string representing the derived key
